story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded in 1995, SOLUTION Tuition Centre began with a simple mission: to provide quality, personalized education to every student in Guwahati. What started as a small initiative has grown into one of the city's most trusted names in home tuition.
story.p2: Over 24 years, we've helped hundreds of students achieve academic excellence across CBSE, ICSE, and Assam State Boards. Our approach combines experienced faculty, proven teaching methods, and genuine care for each student's progress.
story.p3: Today, with a 5.0-star rating and over 93 glowing reviews, we continue to uphold the values that made us a household name — dedication, simplicity, and results.

items.question: What are your class timings?
items.answer: We offer flexible timings to accommodate students' school schedules. Classes are available throughout the day and evening.

items.question: Do you provide home tuition?
items.answer: Yes, we provide both center-based and home tuition services across Guwahati.

items.question: What is your fee structure?
items.answer: Fees vary based on class, subjects, and format (individual/group). Contact us for customized packages tailored to your needs.

items.question: Do you offer demo classes?
items.answer: Yes! We offer free demo classes so students can experience our teaching methodology before enrolling.

items.question: Which boards do you cater to?
items.answer: We provide coaching for CBSE, ICSE, and Assam State Board students.

items.question: How do you ensure quality teaching?
items.answer: Our faculty undergoes regular training, and we maintain small batch sizes for personalized attention. We also conduct regular assessments to track progress.
